description.en:
Tomochain is an innovative solution to the scalability problem with the Ethereum blockchain. Tomochain plans to support horizontal scaling via adding more second layer blockchains with good performance integrated with Ethereum for backup and atomic cross-chain transfer.

Tomochain is envisioned to be a network of chains that supports instant confirmation, and near zero transaction fee which will be an ideal solution for decentralized apps, token issuances and token integrations for small and big businesses.

ico_data.short_desc: Tomochain is an innovative solution to the scalability problem with the Ethereum blockchain

status_updates.description:
TomoDex - the first decentralized exchange powered by TomoX protocol on TomoChain is officially LIVE!

TomoDEX (dex.tomochain.com) enables spot trading for 6 pairs: TOMO/USDT, BTC/USDT, ETH/USDT, TOMO/BTC, ETH/BTC, ETH/TOMO.

>TomoDEX - Trading in action
www.youtube.com/watch?v=tYxDo1DE-Yo

TomoDEX P2P Lending has been LIVE! 

All functionality is handled through auditable smart contracts & secured by the TomoChain blockchain. The P2P lending service uses a unique and familiar spot trading order book approach to provide fixed-term USDT loans of 1/7/30/90 days based on interest rate and position. Borrowers can flexibly back their loans through a choice of collateral too, including BTC, ETH & TOMO. 

https://dex.tomochain.com/markets/lending

Secure-Convenient-No custody-No KYC

TomoChain Weekly Recap (01/06 - 07/06) 

Howâ€™s everything going TOMO family? 2020 is already half way through. Now looking back we are surprised by how many great achievements we have obtained despite external difficulties like COVID-19 and social distancing. 
Starting off the first week right is the first step to succeed in the second half of the year. Letâ€™s see how our productive week was spent with our weekly news: https://t.me/TomoChainChannel/484

Apart from the traditional spot trading, TomoDEX introduces Lending features to maximize TomoChain's users experience ðŸ”¥

TomoDEX is a decentralized exchange consists of both spot trading & lending features. This article compares TomoDEX lending with some other existing platforms on the market to show why TomoDEX has the advantages to overpower the lending market. 

Details: https://medium.com/tomochain/tomodex-introduces-lending-features-edd594d1084d

ðŸ”¥TomoChain - Monthly Recap May 2020ðŸ”¥

New yet familiar, TomoChain would like to introduce a brand new twist starting this Mayâ€™s monthly recap.

Same throwback but in a different form, let us walk you through TomoChainâ€™s May timeline. Donâ€™t hesitate to give us your feedback about this new series!

https://youtu.be/0fMezAdwpCE

TomoDex (https://dex.tomochain.com) opens up another campaign: Spot Trading Competition is taking over the TomoChain verse with 15,000 $TOMO to be absorbed!
<Read more: https://medium.com/tomochain/tomodex-trading-competition-15-000-tomo-to-win-466dc14ab70f>

Duration: 29/5 3AM - 07/6 3AM (UTC)

10 days to take part in 2 types of promotions, trading with TOMO/USDT, BTC/USDT and ETH/USDT!

Leaderboard can be directly updated via https://leaderboard.tomochain.com/#/

TomoChain shakes hands with ThreeFold (threefold.io) to decentralize Cloud Computing & TomoChain Masternodes.

TomoChain developers can benefit from an affordable cloud offering & the autonomous execution via ThreeFoldâ€™s Smart Contract for IT & join forces to work towards a common vision of a sustainable & decentralized world

Read more: https://medium.com/tomochain/tomochain-threefold-joining-forces-to-decentralize-cloud-computing-tomochain-masternodes-12004bfdf14f
